question: Can I get a refund?
answer: Yes, you can get a refund if you cancel your booking at least 7 days before the tour start date. Please note that a cancellation fee may apply if you cancel within 7 days of the tour.

question: Can I change the travel date?
answer: Yes, you can change the travel date by contacting our customer service team at least 14 days before your original tour date. We will do our best to accommodate your request, subject to availability.

question: When and where does the tour end?
answer: The tour ends on the last day of your itinerary at the designated drop-off location. The specific end time and location will be provided to you during the tour.

question: Do you arrange airport transfers?
answer: Yes, we arrange airport transfers for our customers upon request. Please let us know your flight details in advance, and our team will ensure a smooth transfer to your accommodation.
